name: Micro Bitcoin Finance
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
The Micro Bitcoin mBTC is frictionless mining generation mBTC hard-coded on its smart contract to use as future store of value currency.

mBTC is a community driven, fair launched DeFi Token. Two simple functions occur during each trade: Reflection, LP Acquisition.
